short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows to hide items you're not interested on list.am, so that they don't show up in your search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide non-relevant items from the search results. Hidden items are not shown anymore, but if you want them back you can get them back (all or only ones on the current page).
